record.titleTypeName: Business School, National Association of Retail Grocers, 1952
record.description: Seated, left to right: George H. Brown (professor of marketing, University of Chicago, back to camera); R. J. Frederick (National Association of Retail Grocers director); Ray Cowperthwaite (National Association of Retail Grocers director); Charles A. Rovetta (associate professor and dean of students, School of Business, University of Chicago); Marshall D. Ketchum (associate professor of finance, University of Chicago); Miss Janet Metzger (Metzger's Super Market); George Logan (Logan's, Inc,); John Morrison (Rite-Way Foodliner); standing: Harold L. Simpson (Simpson's Super Store); Fred Meijer (Meijer's Super Markets); H. E. Rush (W. W. Wilt, Inc.); Marie Kiefer (National Association of Retail Grocers secretary-manager). [Photograph gift of the Graduate School of Business, May 1965].
record.subject4: University of Chicago. Graduate School of Business
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
